original_title: おじさんが好きすぎるギャル おじさんの頼みならごっくんだって中出しだってなんだかんだで全部許しちゃう！
overview: Even though she looks like a gal, she's innocent and has an outstanding style. Nino-chan (Arai Rima), who can't say no if she asks for anything, will listen to her uncle's perverted request! The popular work that won the top sales on the FANZA doujin floor has already been made into a live-action film!
title: A gal who loves her uncle too much If she asks for it, she’ll forgive everything, even if it’s a cum swallow or a vaginal cum shot! Lima Arai
